thread.title: BRIEF-Citizens Financial Group Reports First Quarter Net Income Of $388 Million And Diluted EPS Of $0.78

title: BRIEF-Citizens Financial Group Reports First Quarter Net Income Of $388 Million And Diluted EPS Of $0.78

organizations.name: brief-citizens financial group reports first quart

text:
April 20, 2018 / 10:38 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Citizens Financial Group Reports First Quarter Net Income Of $388 Million And Diluted EPS Of $0.78 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Citizens Financial Group Inc: 
* CITIZENS FINANCIAL GROUP, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME OF $388 MILLION AND DILUTED EPS OF $0.78 
* Q1 REVENUE $1.5 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.46 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.78 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.76 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $1,091 MILLION VERSUS $1,005 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
